changeSet.author: mprokofeva
changeSet.sql: create table db_events.event_types ( id uuid not null constraint event_types_pkey primary key, name varchar(255) not null, description varchar(255), active boolean default true, updated timestamp );

changeSet.author: mprokofeva
changeSet.sql: create table db_events.owners ( id uuid not null constraint owners_pkey primary key, name varchar(255) not null, description varchar(255), active boolean default true, updated timestamp );

changeSet.author: mprokofeva
changeSet.sql: create table db_events.events ( id uuid not null constraint events_pkey primary key, title varchar(255) not null, owner_id uuid not null constraint events_owners_fk references db_events.owners, event_type_id uuid constraint events_event_type_fk references db_events.event_types, date_start date not null, date_end date, start_time time(6), end_time time(6), description varchar(255), location varchar(255), active boolean default true, updated timestamp );
